title: (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005),
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No.10) (Emergency Measures in 
the Public Interest-Jobseeker’s Allowance) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2020 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2020. 

Emergency measures in the public interest - jobseeker’s allowance
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) (amendment) (no.10) (emergency measure public interest-jobseeker allowance) regulation 2020 (2) regulation social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) regulation 2007 2020 shall construed together one may cited together social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) regulation 2007 2020 emergency measure public interest - jobseeker allowance

title: (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005),
heading: 2. Article 121A (amended by article 2 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
2. Article 121A (amended by article 2 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 7) (Emergency Measures in 
the Public Interest-Jobseeker’s Allowance) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 222 of 
2020)) of the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control) 
Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 142 of 2007) is amended by the substitution of the 
following sub-article for sub-article (2): 

“(2) This article shall cease to have effect on 17 September 2020.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [309] 3 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the foregoing 
Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 August, 2020. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 August, 2020. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Employment Affairs and Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [309]

title: (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations temporarily extend, until 17 September 2020, the period 
whereby the rule in section 141(2)(a) of the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 
2005 is suspended. That rule, which provides that Jobseeker’s Allowance is paid 
only from the fourth day of unemployment, will be waived until 17 September
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation temporarily extend 17 september 2020 period whereby rule section 141(2)(a) social welfare consolidation act 2005 suspended rule provides jobseeker allowance paid fourth day unemployment waived 17 september
